extends java.lang.Object

        public static int getQRScore​(java.lang.String hash)
        This function obtains a score for a scanned QR Code
        Parameters:
        hash - the hash value of a scanned QR code
        Returns:
        the score assigned to a particular QR Code

      • hashQRCode

        public static java.lang.String hashQRCode​(java.lang.String contents)
                                   throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Obtains a SHA-256 hash for provided QR Code contents
        Parameters:
        contents - ohe contents of the QR Code as a String of characters
        Returns:
        the SHA-256 hash for a QR Code
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - Throws such an exception when a "SHA-256" algorithm is not found in getInstance

      • bytesToHex

        public static java.lang.String bytesToHex​(byte[] hash)
        Converts bytes to their corresponding hex value
        Parameters:
        hash - the hash for a particular QR Code
        Returns:
        String of hexadecimal values representing a QR Code

      • getQRCodeName

        public static java.lang.String getQRCodeName​(java.lang.String hash,
                                             java.lang.String[] names,
                                             java.lang.String[] names2,
                                             java.lang.String[] names3,
                                             java.lang.String[] names4,
                                             java.lang.String[] names5)
        Assigns a unique name to a QR code based on it's hash
        Parameters:
        hash - the hash of the given QR code
        names - list of potential words for first word slot
        names2 - list of potential words for second word slot
        names3 - list of potential words for third word slot
        names4 - list of potential words for fourth word slot
        names5 - list of potential words for fifth word slot
        Returns:
        the name generated from the QR code's hash

                                                  int length,
                                                  int file)
        Retrieves data from a file for MainActivity
        Parameters:
        resources - references the resources in AndroidStudio project
        length - length of the data file/max # of elements that can be read
        Returns:
        a string array of file elements, at most 'length' of them
